articles.title: ISI-BUDS
articles.description: Irvine Summer Institute in Biostatistics and Undergraduate Data Science
articles.contents:
ISI-BUDS is a six-week summer program in biostatistics and biomedical data science.
More info about the program content. More info about financial support.
Check requirements to see if you qualify for the program. If you do, you may submit your application. We strongly encourage applications from …..
Important Dates
Applications open - March 15
Applications due - May 1
Results announced - May 15
ISI-BUDS dates - July 11 - Aug 18

articles.title: Eligibility
articles.contents:
Applicants must
Be enrolled as an undergraduate student at the time of the institute.
Be US citizen or permanent resident
Have knowledge of and interest in statistics, computing, probability, calculus, and linear algebra. These prerequisites are flexible.
Have interest in using empirical data to answer scientific questions.
Participants will be required to follow COVID-19 related regulations of the University of California Irvine, including proof of vaccination.

Application Form
Please fill out the following application form: (link here). The application form will ask you to
answer questions about your background and interest
provide an email address of a faculty member who will submit a recommendation letter for you
upload your unofficial college transcripts
upload your resume/CV
